Posts.Content: highriskz wrote: Hi. I live abroad and i am looking for a contact for an oncologist who deals with tamoxifen as prevention in healthy high risk women. I have been told here that five years is the maximum time it is recommended to take tamoxifen, for prevention in healthy women, but am looking to have that verified by an expert in the US. If you have any suggestions, please contact me. thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: looking for a contact highriskz MelissaDallas
